extensionDescription.message: Automatically rotate through open tabs. Inspired by: Revolver - Tabs by Ben Hedrington

extensionTitle.message: Chrome Tab Hopper by Domainhizmetleri - Automatically rotate through open tabs

optionsTitle.message: Chrome Tab Hopper by Domainhizmetleri - Options

inactiveLabel.message: Only run when user is idle

originalAuthor.message: Inspired by: Revolver - Tabs by Ben Hedrington

secondsDescription.message:
Default display time for each tab. Example seconds: 10
You can set different duration for each tab below.

autostartDescription.message: Automatically start Tab Hopper when browser starts.

reloadDescription.message:
Check this box to reload the page before each tab is displayed.
Specific tabs selected below will always be reloaded regardless of this global setting.

inactiveDescription.message: If the browser has been used in the last 15 seconds, rotation will be paused.

tabListDescription.message:
Checked tabs will be reloaded before being displayed.
Seconds column allows you to set custom display duration for each tab. Leave empty to use the default value above.

toastSavingMessage.message: Your settings are being saved, please wait.

toastSavedMessage.message: Your settings have been saved successfully.

toastElementsNotFound.message: Required form elements not found. Please refresh the page.

toastUnexpectedError.message: An error occurred while saving settings.

toastRestartErrorMessage.message: Tab Hopper could not be updated:

toastInactiveMode.message: Will only run when browser is inactive.

toastManualStart.message: Tab Hopper stopped. You can start it manually.

toastListRefreshError.message: Tab list could not be refreshed.
